Career Objective: Seeking a challenging and rewarding career in database and BI (SSRS, SSIS) professional, where I can contribute my knowledge and skills for growth and development of the origination and to be able to implement solutions that meet the customer requirement using my variety of development skills and technical expertise.

PROFESSIONAL PROFILE:

· Having 4.6 Years’ Experience in SSRS, SQL Server 2008/2012/2014	 (Stored Procedure, Function and View writing), and SQL Server Integration Services 2008/2012/2014 (SSIS). 
· Knowledge and Experience in:
· SQL Server programming concept 
· Designing and deploying reports (SSRS).
· Having knowledge in creating SSIS packages by using different data transformation and task load data from different data sources into application database, database object and logins in SQL server integration services.
· Capable of learning new technical skills.
· Proficient in creating SSRS Report with. Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
· Fast learner, keeps abreast of latest technologies, adept at developing and promoting analytical software solutions, capable to switch to allied or varied technologies depending on project requirements.
· Worked Extensively on ETL process using SSIS package.
· Demonstrated leadership abilities and team work skills as well as the ability to accomplish
tasks under minimal direction and supervision.

TECHNICAL PROFICIENCY:

· Database : SQL Server 2008,2012,2014
· Microsoft BI Tools : SSIS 2008 R2,2012,SSRS 2008R2,2012
· Basic Knowledge of Power BI

WORKING EXPERIENCE:

· Currently working as Software Developer (SSRS/SSIS/ETL TOOLS/SQL) for D2K Technologies, Navi Mumbai from 22 April 2016 to present.  
· Worked as Software Engineer for KENT RO SYSTEMS LTD., Noida from 11th Nov 2013 To 9th April 2016.

EDUCATION CREDENTIALS:

· MCA Passed Master of Computer Application with first class (69%) from Uttarakhand Technical University, 2012.
· B. Sc. (PCM) Passed Bachelor of Science from Kumaun University, Nainital, 2009.
· Intermediate Passed Intermediate from Uttarakhand Board, 2006.
· High School Passed High School from Uttarakhand Board, 2003.

PROJECT HANDLED DURING WORK IN D2K Technologies

Topic	:  MIS 
Domain                 :  Banking
Client	:  Oriental bank of commerce
Team Members	:  7 Members
Technology	:  MS-SQL Server 2012, T-SQL, SSRS, SSIS

Description:	
Main purpose of this project is bank have junk data in finacle because of less no of validation. Due to this bank have to difficulty to submit report to RBI through system without any manual intervation. For this process we are extracting data from finacle for accounts tables, customer tables, facility tables and mapped with our master to show user data discrepancy and invalid value or blank value. After this identification we have send data to finacle for updating incorrect value by user permission

Roles and Responsibilities
· Created Views, Functions and Stored Procedures for Reports.
· Creating Reports using SSDT and Deploying Reports in production.
· Scheduling And Monitoring the ETL packages for Daily load in SQL Server Job Agent
· Schedule reports for automatically generation and send Email/FTP using subscription
· SSIS, SSRS, Scheduling Jobs.


Topic	:  MOC Banking
Domain                 :  Banking
Team Members	:  7 Members
Client	:  Oriental bank of commerce
Technology	:  MS-SQL Server 2012, T-SQL, SSRS, SSIS

Project Description
MOC (Memorandum of Changes) more often referred to as MOC is an important document enclosed with the Bank Audit Report whenever the Auditor observes significant issues effecting the Financial Statements of the Bank.

Roles and Responsibilities
· Created Views, Functions and Stored Procedures for Reports.
· Creating Reports using SSDT and Deploying Reports in production.
· Responsible for maintains of all DB objects according to requirement.
· Schedule reports for automatically generation and send Email/FTP using subscription
· SSIS, SSRS, Scheduling Jobs.


PROJECT HANDLED DURING WORK IN KENT RO SYSTEMS, NOIDA

Topic	:  Kent ERP Systems
Domain                 :  Consumer Goods
Team Members	:  8 Members
Client	:  Kent Ro’s Business’s key Users.
Technology	:  T-SQL, MS-SQL Server
Duration       	:  Nov 2013 – Mar 2014

Project Synopsis	    
This project is for a consumer goods company Kent Ro Systems. Kent ERP system is an ERP package for Kent Ro that tracks the daily activity of product from production to selling within organization. This ERP System integrated with SSRS Portal and help to Business User for generate the Real time report.

Roles and Responsibilities
· Responsible for the Clients (Business users) interaction, Requirements analysis, and Database development.
· Responsible in database modeling for OLTP System for Transactional Database and preparing for TSD documentation for ERP Systems.
· Responsible for Creation of the database for ERP Systems, tables, store procedures, functions, triggers and batch jobs using T-SQL etc.
· Responsible for maintains of all DB objects according to requirement.





Topic	:  Kent- SSRS Portal
Domain                 :  Consumer Goods
Team Members	:  4 Members
Client	:  Kent Ro’s Business’s Key Users
Technology	:  T-SQL, MS-SQL Server
Tools                      : BIDS 2008, Visual Studio 2010, SSMS
Duration       	:  April 2015 – Jun 2016

Project Synopsis
Kent SSRS is a web based application that provides the reporting solutions with user interface for 
Clients (Business Users) of purchase, sales, service, finance, warehouses etc.

Roles and Responsibilities
· Responsible for the Clients (Business users) interaction, Requirements analysis, and Database development.
· Responsible for Creation of the database for ERP Systems, tables, store procedures, functions, triggers etc.
· Involved in the full cycle of application development. Both back end and front end.
· Designed and developed the SSRS reports as per the requirement in the form of Matrix, Table and Chart using SQL Server2008 reporting services.
· Generated the reports using Report Wizard and Report Designer.


EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES:
· N.C.C. ‘B’ Certificate.
· Attended 10 days All India Tracking Camp.
